name: ZeroNote
short_description: Offline-first encrypted notes application. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Offline-first encrypted notes application. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. ZeroNote is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, security, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host ZeroNote on your home server to offline-first encrypted notes application. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ZeroNote to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
